actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain employees of the Immigration and Naturalization Service shall not be subject to mandatory retirement until such time as they reach 65 years of age.

summary.text: Prohibits the mandatory retirement of any immigration supervisor employed by the Immigration and Naturalization Services who is in good health and is less than 65 years old.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that certain employees of the Immigration and Naturalization Service shall not be subject to mandatory retirement until such time as they reach 65 years of age.
